Original summary and description are too generic and lack actionable details. data.current_description: **This endpoint allows you to validate an email address.**
data.summary_suggestion: Validate a single email address in real-time
data.description_suggestion: Validates a single email address and returns detailed information about its validity. Accepts an email address as input and returns a verdict (valid, invalid, or risky) along with detailed validation metrics. Use this endpoint to validate email addresses in real-time during user signup or form submission. Requires Email Validation API key authentication.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are too generic and lack actionable details. Enhanced version specifies real-time validation, explains input/output (verdict and metrics), provides use cases, and clarifies authentication requirements for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'ListEmailJobForVerification' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary was unclear about the presigned URL purpose. Description lacked clarity about job creation as a side effect and the temporary nature of the presigned URL. Enhanced version clarifies the workflow, explains the asynchronous processing, and better indicates what happens after the response for AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Request a presigned URL and headers for Bulk Email Address Validation list upload.
data.current_description:
**This endpoint returns a presigned URL and request headers. Use this information to upload a list of email addresses for verification.**

Note that in a successful response the `content-type` header value matches the provided `file_type` parameter in the `PUT` request.

Once you have an `upload_uri` and the `upload_headers`, you're ready to upload your email address list for verification. For the expected format of the email address list and a sample upload request, see the [Bulk Email Address Validation Overview page](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sendgrid/ui/managing-contacts/email-address-validation/bulk-email-address-validation-overview).
data.summary_suggestion: Generate presigned URL for bulk email validation file upload
data.description_suggestion: Initiates a bulk email validation job by generating a presigned URL and request headers for uploading an email address list. Returns an `upload_uri` and `upload_headers` that match the provided `file_type` parameter. The presigned URL is temporary and can be used to upload your email list file. After receiving the response, use the returned `upload_uri` and `upload_headers` to upload your email address list. This creates a new validation job that will process asynchronously. See Bulk Email Address Validation Overview for file format requirements.
data.reasoning: Summary was unclear about the presigned URL purpose. Description lacked clarity about job creation as a side effect and the temporary nature of the presigned URL. Enhanced version clarifies the workflow, explains the asynchronous processing, and better indicates what happens after the response for AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: This request lists all of a user's Bulk Email Validation Jobs.
data.current_description: **This endpoint returns a list of all of a user's Bulk Email Validation Jobs.**
data.summary_suggestion: List all bulk email validation jobs
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all bulk email validation jobs for the authenticated user. Returns job metadata including job IDs, status, creation timestamps, and processing progress. Use this endpoint to view all validation jobs and their current states. Jobs are returned in reverse chronological order (most recent first).
data.reasoning: Original summary and description lack specificity about what information is returned and how results are ordered. Enhanced version clarifies the response structure, explains use cases, and specifies ordering for better AI agent decision-making about when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'GetEmailJobForVerification' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original summary and description are vague about what information is returned and what status values mean. Enhanced version specifies the job ID parameter requirement, explains the status field values, clarifies the response structure, and better indicates use cases for monitoring job progress.

data.current_summary: This request returns a single Bulk Email Validation Job.
data.current_description: **This endpoint returns a specific Bulk Email Validation Job. You can use this endpoint to check on the progress of a Job.**
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific bulk email validation job status
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information about a specific bulk email validation job by job ID. Returns job metadata including current status (pending, processing, completed, failed), progress metrics, creation timestamp, and result summary. Use this endpoint to monitor the progress of an ongoing validation job or retrieve results after completion. Status values indicate whether the job is still processing or has finished.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are vague about what information is returned and what status values mean. Enhanced version specifies the job ID parameter requirement, explains the status field values, clarifies the response structure, and better indicates use cases for monitoring job progress.
